title: Grateful Dead Live at Shoreline Amphitheatre on 1987-10-04
lineage: DAT playback on Sony PCM-R500 > XLR analog outputs > Neutrik inputs, Presonus Firebox  (pre-amplification and analog-to-digital) > firewire > PC/WinXP Pro > recorded as 24 bit/96 KHz WAV using Wavelab 5 > mastered with Waves L3 Multimaximizer > rendered to 16/44.1 using Waves IDR (type I dither/ultra shaping) > tracking (CDWAV 1.9) > FLAC (level 8).
taper: DAT kindly provided for transfer by B.Koucky, rec'd from B.Fried in 1996.
source: Healy Matrix SBD > PCM > DAT (48KHz)> DAT.
